test.instr: (:ins (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X washmachine))) (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X microwave))) (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X refrigerator))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (sort Y closet))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X white) (sort Y airconditioner))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X bed))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (sort Y television))) (:task (close X) (:cond (sort X microwave))) )
test.nl: The washmachine is closed. The microwave is opened. The refrigerator is opened. Put a remotecontrol in the closet. Put the white remotecontrol on the airconditioner. Go to the bed. Put the can on the television. Close door of microwave.
